description:
Michelle Higgins writes the Fix column for The New York Times, offering advice on home renovations and decore. She has covered travel, real estate and consumer news for more than a decade, creating compelling, shareable content for both digital and print.
Ms.Â Higgins was previously the Practical Traveler columnist for the Travel section, offering insider information on how best to navigate the travel experience. She also worked at The Wall Street Journal covering travel, personal finance and automobiles.
title: Michelle Higgins
text:
Michelle Higgins writes the Fix column for The New York Times, offering advice on home renovations and decore. She has covered travel, real estate and consumer news for more than a decade, creating compelling, shareable content for both digital and print.
Ms. Higgins was previously the Practical Traveler columnist for the Travel section, offering insider information on how best to navigate the travel experience. She also worked at The Wall Street Journal covering travel, personal finance and automobiles.
